name: Yotpo
headline: Yotpo Integration
overview: Yotpo's eCommerce marketing platform offers the most advanced solutions for customer reviews, visual marketing, loyalty, referrals, and SMS marketing. For more information, visit the Yotpo Website (https://www.yotpo.com/).
features: Sends orders to Yotpo on creation of an invoice
additionalInformation: Please head over to the official docs to see advanced setup instructions.
